instr{idx: 0, op: store{var: "x", expr: 3}}.
instr{idx: 1, op: increment{var: "x"}}.
instr{idx: 2, op: store{var: "y", expr: 0}}.
instr{idx: 3, op: fork{goto: 5}}.
instr{idx: 4, op: conditionalGoto{dest: 1, var: "y"}}.
instr{idx: 5, op: increment{var: "x"}}.
instr{idx: 6, op: increment{var: "x"}}.
instr{idx: 7, op: increment{var: "x"}}.
expr.funcCall{id: 0, name: "<"}.
expr.funcArg{funcID: 0, argID: 1, idx: 0}.
expr.funcArg{funcID: 0, argID: 2, idx: 1}.
expr.var{id: 1, name: "x"}.
expr.intLit{id: 2, value: 5}.
expr.intLit{id: 3, value: 0}.
----
application/datalog

time{time: 1}.
time{time: 2}.
time{time: 3}.
time{time: 4}.
time{time: 5}.
time{time: 6}.
time{time: 7}.
time{time: 8}.
time{time: 9}.
time{time: 10}.
time{time: 11}.
time{time: 12}.
time{time: 13}.
time{time: 14}.
time{time: 15}.
----
application/datalog

state.ProgramCounter{}?
----
application/datalog
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 0, thread: 1, time: 1}.
state.ProgramCounter{counter: 1, thread: 1, time: 10}.

state.ProgramCounter{counter: 4, thread: 1, time: 9}.

state.ProgramCounter{counter: 5, thread: 114, time: 13}.

state.Var{}?
----
application/datalog
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 10, value: 2, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 10, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 11, value: 3, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 11, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 12, value: 3, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 12, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 13, value: 3, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 13, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 14, value: 3, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 14, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 15, value: 4, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 15, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 16, value: 4, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 16, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 1, time: 4, value: 1, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 4, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 1, time: 5, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 1, time: 6, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 1, time: 7, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 8, value: 2, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 8, value: true, var: "y"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 9, value: 2, var: "x"}.
state.Var{thread: 1, time: 9, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 106, time: 5, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 106, time: 6, value: true, var: "y"}.

state.Var{thread: 106, time: 8, value: true, var: "y"}.

viz.message{}?
----
application/datalog
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 10}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 9}}.
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 10}}.
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 11}}.
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 12}, toTick: tick{place: 114, time: 13}}.

viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 13}}.
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 15}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 14}}.

viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 1, time: 9}, toTick: tick{place: 1, time: 8}}.

viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 106, time: 7}, toTick: tick{place: 106, time: 6}}.
viz.message{fromTick: tick{place: 106, time: 8}, toTick: tick{place: 106, time: 7}}.
